#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define LL unsigned long long

void MUL(LL F[2][2], LL M[2][2]);


void BP(LL F[2][2],LL n);

LL Solve(LL n)
{
  LL F[2][2] = {{1,1},{1,0}};
  if (n == 0)
      return 0;
  BP(F, n-1);
  return F[0][0];
}

void MUL(LL F[2][2], LL M[2][2])
{
  LL x =  F[0][0]*M[0][0] + F[0][1]*M[1][0];
  LL y =  F[0][0]*M[0][1] + F[0][1]*M[1][1];
  LL z =  F[1][0]*M[0][0] + F[1][1]*M[1][0];
  LL w =  F[1][0]*M[0][1] + F[1][1]*M[1][1];

  F[0][0] = x%MOD;
  F[0][1] = y%MOD;
  F[1][0] = z%MOD;
  F[1][1] = w%MOD;
}

void BP(LL F[2][2], LL n)
{
  if( n == 0 || n == 1)
      return;
  LL M[2][2] = {{1,1},{1,0}};
 
  BP(F, n/2);
  MUL(F, F);
 
  if (n%2 != 0)
     MUL(F, M);
}

int main()
{
    long T;
    LL N;
    scanf("%ld",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        scanf("%llu",&N);
        printf("%llu\n",Solve(N));
    }
    return 0;
}
